text:
[Verse]
Walking under starlit skies
Dreams alive in open eyes
Wishing on the night so bright
Hopes ignite in moonlight

[Verse 2]
City lights they fade away
Night becomes a grand ballet
Stars above they guide our way
In the dark we chose to stay

[Chorus]
Sky full of dreams
Up above it all it seems
We can fly with open wings
Reach for all our wildest things

[Verse 3]
Hearts aligned with cosmic beams
Lost in this our midnight schemes
Chasing echoes of our screams
Life is more than what it seems

[Bridge]
Holding hands in twilight beams
Making shadows in our gleams
Hoping night will break at seams
To keep us in these dreams

[Chorus]
Sky full of dreams
Up above it all it seems
We can fly with open wings
Reach for all our wildest things
title: Sky Full of Dreams
